participant_abstract.sent: Meeting B went much better, everyone clearly knows everyones roles in the team now, we have structure, confidence and the means to complete the task at hand.

participant_actions.sent: See desicions section above, also we'll wait for instructions from Big Brother.

participant_decisions.sent: From the industrial design the remote is going to be powered by batteries, it's going to transmit using infared technology, basically using already existing technology, this product should be quick and easy to design.

From the user interface design side it's got to be simple and ergonomic and from the marketing side of things we're not going to incorporate voice recognition facilities, marketing will reserch into colours, ergonomics, other company products that have sold well, etc and then talk with the other design teams.
